briefdescription.para: Typedef to represent the Characteristic property of Sensor Services.

detaileddescription.para: Container for the accelerometer sensor values send via BLE
Characteristic properties for the accelerometer sensor

briefdescription.para: Initialize application callback to intimate for events from sensor services.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize application callback to intimate for events from sensor services

parameterdescription.para: Application Callback that will be called on data reception for any sensor services characteristics
Application Callback that will be notified about the data send status.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise. Refer Retcode_General_E and Ble_Retcode_E for other values.

briefdescription.para: This function registers the Sensor Services at the ATT server. This must be done during the boot phase of the stack.

detaileddescription.para: This function registers the Sensor Services at the ATT server. This must be done during the boot phase of the stack.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise. Refer Retcode_General_E and Ble_Retcode_E for other values.
Sensor Services must have been successfully initialized prior.

briefdescription.para: This function sends data to the client.

detaileddescription.para: This function sends data to the client

parameterdescription.para: The length of the payload to be sent

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise. Refer Retcode_General_E and Ble_Retcode_E for other values.
Sensor Services must have been successfully initialized and registered prior. SensorServices_SendEventCallback will be triggered to provide the status of every individual send's.
